A stasis pod lands in the jungle.  The stasis pod activates it's 
scanners and scans for a life form to adapt the bot inside to.  It 
found a suitable form and scanned the creature.  A few hours later, 
the pod opens and out steps a hooded, female bot.  She looks around.  
She transforms into her beast mode. A spitting cobra.  She slithered 
along looking for food and another bot to communicate with.



ENTER : SPITFIRE



Name: Spitfire
Alegeiance: Maximal 
Function: Hunter/Fighter
Beast Mode: Spitting Cobra 
Robot appearance: Female, Polished Green Steel

STATS: 

Strength: 9 
Intelligence: 7 
Speed: 10 
Endurance: 7 
Rank: 4 
Courage: 8 
Firepower: 3 
Skill: 9  


Weapons: 
Long poisonous fangs. 
Poisonous venom that is spit from fangs.

Poison can partially dissolve most armor plating.  It will kill the 
bio-techno portion of a bot beyond repair and kill the victim slowly 
and painfully.  A victim will die in half a day after a bite. 

If the venom is spit into the optics of a bot, it will cause 
permemant blindness and possable poison the victim is victim has open 
wound at the time of being spit on.
